keywords.value: ST. LIFER, HERBERT. THE BOARD OF GOVERNORS AND MEMBERS OF BEACH POINT CLUB NOTE WITH DEEP SORROW THE PASSING OF OUR FELLOW MEMBER, HERBERT ST. LIFER, AND EXTEND SINCERE CONDOLENCES TO HIS FAMILY. JAMES DREYFUS, PRESIDENT 1
keywords.name: persons

lead_paragraph: ST. LIFER--Herbert. The Board of Governors and members of Beach Point Club note with deep sorrow the passing of our fellow member, Herbert St. Lifer, and extend sincere condolences to his family. James Dreyfus, President 1

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  ST. LIFER, HERBERT. THE BOARD OF GOVERNORS AND MEMBERS OF BEACH POINT CLUB NOTE WITH DEEP SORROW THE PASSING OF OUR FELLOW MEMBER, HERBERT ST. LIFER, AND EXTEND SINCERE CONDOLENCES TO HIS FAMILY. JAMES DREYFUS, PRESIDENT 1
